channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: American man who volunteered for an experimental pig kidney transplant is off dialysis and wants to ‘give some people some hope’
item.description: A pig kidney has kept another New Hampshire man, Tim Andrews, off dialysis for a record seven months and counting.

item.title: In Small-Town Michigan, True American Values Are As Strong As Ever

item.title: Economy’s hiring collapse turns Trump’s promises of instant results into plea for patience
